devdoc.author: Ciocirlan Stefan-Dan (sdcioc)
devdoc.details: Give the Task structure and and external function for the Task contract

addTask(bytes32,uint256,uint8,uint256).details: This function is used to add a task to the contract The function is payable and the fee is sent to the contract and kept as a stake and it returns to the task owner when the task is deleted

params.computingType: The type of computing (0: cpu / 1: gpu)
params.ipfsSha256: The IPFS hash of the task
params.size: The i/o size of the task (in bytes)

clear().details: This function is used to clear the contract

params.taskAdditionFee: The fee for adding a task

deleteTask(bytes32).details: Return the task fee to the owner

params.ipfsSha256: The IPFS hash of the task
